articles.title: Tropical storm Isaias expected to become a hurricane - CNN
articles.description: Tropical storm Isaias has formed just south of Puerto Rico and is expected to become a hurricane. It is the ninth named storm for the Atlantic Hurricane season on record.  CNN Meteorologist Jennifer Gray has the latest forecast.
